positions.title: Person
positions.description: I am a technology trend researcher and author, consulting and conducting workshops on Artificial Intelligence, Foresight Mindset, Automotive, Innovation, Digital Transformation, Silicon Valley, Online Harassment.

positions.title: Keynote Speaker
positions.description:
Speaker at events, companies and delegations including Daimler, Porsche, MAN, Harley-Davidson, Governor of Baden-Württemberg, IMD, PMI, Wells Fargo, Allianz, IHK, VNL, ADAC...
...and conferences such as TEDxSanFrancisco and TEDxSalzburg, Forum Innovation, CIO Insight, PARC, GSummit, Cisco Social Media Days, IEEE, LAUX, Gamification World Asia, SBPM One, Enterprise Gamification Forum NYC, Social Business Summit Tel Aviv

positions.title: Author
positions.description:
- Author of a over dozen books and hundreds of blogs and articles including TechCrunch, Forbes, Der Aktionär, or Wirtschaftsblatt.

My Websites, where I blog regularly:
https://technophilosoph.com/
https://futureangst.com/
http://www.derletztefuehrerscheinneuling.com/
http://www.thelastdriverlicenseholder.com/

My books:
"Kreative Intelligenz: Wie ChatGPT und Co die Welt verändern werden"
"Cyberf*cked: Wie Frauen im Internet bedroht und belästigt werden - und was wir alle dagegen tun können"
"Le dernier titulaire d'un permis de conduire est déjà né"
"Totschlagargumente für Anfänger: Wie Sie erfolgreich jede Diskussion im Keim ersticken"
"Future Angst: Wie wir von Innovationsvorreitern zu Innovationsnachzüglern wurden"
"Sorry Not Sorry: Die Kunst wie man sich nicht entschuldigt"
"Corona als Chance: Was nach der Krise anders sein wird"
"Wenn Affen von Affen lernen: Wie künstliche Intelligenz uns erst richtig zum Menschen macht"
"The Last Driver's License Holder Has Already Been Born"
"Foresight Mindset: Die Kunst und Wissenschaft die eigene Zukunft zu designen."
"Der letzte Führerscheinneuling ... ist bereits geboren."
"Das Silicon-Valley-Mindset" (The Silicon Valley Mindset: What we can learn from the innovation champions and combine with our strengths)
"Enterprise Gamification: Engaging People By Letting Them Have Fun"
"Gamification in Healthcare & Fitness"
"Gamification in Community & Innovation Management"
"Gamification in Banking & Financials"
"Gamification in Sales & Support"
"Gamification in Human Resources"
"Gamification at Work"
"SAP Visual Composer"
"SAP Composite Application Framework"

positions.title: Networker & Connector
positions.description:
Organizing Silicon Valley Inspiration Tours for executives helping them understand the mindset and latest trends, guiding them through the network of innovators and entrepreneurs.

Connecting them with Silicon Valley companies, startups, VCs, innovators and helping them implementing their own Silicon-Valley-style innovation program with the right mindset.

positions.title: Instructor in Foresight Mindset, Automotive, Innovation, Creativity, Silicon Valley Mindset
positions.description:
I have developed and taught the following courses:
- Artifical Intelligence: How ChatGPT & Co will change our world
- When Monkeys Teach Monkeys - How AI will make us more human
- Foresight Mindset: Discovering trends before they are trends
- Automotive: Disruptions in the automotive industry with self-driving, electric, shared and connected vehicles
- Growth Mindset for Managers
- Intrapreneurship & Innovation - How to set up a corporate innovation program that works
- Creativity: Understanding the framework to successfully innovate
- Creativity Techniques: 130+ techniques to make creativity a habit
- Pitch Training

educations.schoolName: WU (Vienna University of Economics and Business)

allData.headline: Technology Trend Researcher | Author
allData.summary:
- Technology Trend Researcher and Author. Looking at the larger picture of how new technologies impact societies, humans, behaviors and more. Hosting executives in Silicon Valley, helping them understand the Silicon Valley mindset and latest trends, guiding them through the network of innovators, entrepreneurs, thinkers and venture capitalists.

- Author of twenty books.

- Delegation host to Silicon Valley, working with executive teams from companies such as Porsche, VW, DATEV, SAP, or KTM and many SMBs

- Keynote Speaker - Speaker at TEDxSanFrancisco and TEDxSalzburg, Forum Innovation, CIO Insight, PARC, GSummit, Cisco Social Media Days, IEEE, LAUX, Digitale Woche Kiel, SBPM One, Enterprise Gamification Forum NYC, Social Business Summit Tel Aviv and many more

- Senior leader with 20+ years of experience in corporate innovation in high-tech companies.
- Entrepreneur - Founder and CEO of EnterpriseGarage.io; Rappelkopf

Specialties: innovation, artificial intelligence, autonomous cars, electric vehicles, Silicon Valley-mindset, digital transformation, foresight mindset, creativity techniques, intrapreneurship, online-harassment
